snippet: The N.C.A.A. handed down its punishment in the investigation of violations in the North Carolina football program, including a loss of 15 scholarships and a one-year bowl ban.
abstract: The N.C.A.A. handed down its punishment in the investigation of violations in the North Carolina football program, including a loss of 15 scholarships and a one-year bowl ban.

headline.main: North Carolina Loses 15 Scholarships in N.C.A.A. Ruling
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Football: North Carolina Penalized
